description: Hamrio Musica is the leader of a band of thieves named Silver-Rhythm. He can manipulate silver into any form and weapon he wants it to be. He uses the silver skull around his neck to manipulate silver to a weapon of his choice. The silver skull is fused with Reina`s bracelet after she dies and there he gains the weapon "Silver Ray". He is Haru`s good and strongest friend. He later forges Haru the holy sword "Ravelt" which is derived from "Rave" and "Velt", the German word for world.
name: Hamrio Musica
